body.p: This chapter tests various aspects of key referencing.

Within the publication map there is a subordinate keyref topicref to the topic "keyed-topic-one.xml" using the key "keyed-topic-01" (note that the key and filename are different to avoid false positives or confusion about the relationship of the key name to the target topic's filename, which is to say none whatsoever).
